channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed

item.title: Tech Up Your Sourdough With These Upper-Crust Baking Gadgets
item.description: Sourdough bread is one of the most wonderful things you can make with your hands, but it can be fussy and hard to perfect. Now technology takes out mo...

item.title: iOS 19: All the rumored changes Apple could be bringing to its new operating system
item.description: As Apple prepares to unveil iOS 19 at WWDC 2025, several rumors have surfaced, including a potential new name for the operating system and more.

item.title: Best Backpacking Tents (2025), WIRED-Tested and Reviewed
item.description: The right shelter makes all the difference in the backcountry. Here are the best tents we’ve tested and love.

item.title: Lawyers could face ‘severe’ penalties for fake AI-generated citations, UK court warns

item.title: 24 Best Deals on Father's Day Gifts (2025)

item.title: Bill Atkinson, Macintosh Pioneer and Inventor of Hypercard, Dies at 74
item.description: Atkinson’s gleeful brilliance helped people draw on computer screens and access information via links.

item.title: WWDC 2025: What to expect from this year’s conference
item.description: At WWDC 2025, Apple will likely focus on the next iOS, which is rumored to have the most significant design change since the introduction of iOS 7.
